body.name: Swpeet 100Pcs Crib Hardware Screws, Nicked Plated M6 × 40/50/60/70/80mm Hex Socket Head Cap Crib Baby Bed Bolt and Barrel Nuts with 1 x Allen Wrench Perfect for Furniture, Cots, Crib Screws

features: ✿ EASY FOR STORAGE ----Barrel Nuts Size: Total Diameter 11 mm / 0.43''. Those nut is 12.1mm/ 0.47inch and 14.5mm/ 0.57inch in height, the hole diameter is 5mm / 0.2inch, suitable size, can meet your needs. And these barrel nuts are very convenient and small, which is easy for you to store. The barrel nut come to you with a clear box, enable you to store them easily.

✿ WITH A RELEVANT WRENCHES ---- We also provide free relevant wrenches in our sets. 1.It’s simple and lightweight. 2.Six contact surfaces between the Hexagon Socket Screw and the wrench. 3.sufficient and not easily damaged. 4.Can be used to screw deep holes. 5.Can be used to screw very small screws. 6.Both ends of the wrench can be used.

✿ WIDE APPLICATIONS ---- M6 high quality barrel bolt nuts kit is ideal for repairs and replacement. This set of barrel bolts nuts can fit for many different things, such as beds, chairs, cots, crib, sofa and different kinds of furniture, meet your various needs and they can also work well in joining wood, boards, kitchen worktops, etc.

✿ HIGH QUALITY MATERIAL---- Every barrel nut and bolt is Nicked Plated. Those have the performance of high hardness and good toughness, The screw thread is clear and not easy to loose. which make the kit more sturdy and durable. This kind of steel can prevent rust and corrosion.

★ WHAT YOU GET ---- In this kit, You will get 100Pcs high quality barrel bolt nuts, including M6×40mm: 10Pcs; M6×50mm: 10Pcs; M6×60mm: 10Pcs; M6×70mm: 10Pcs; M6×80mm: 10Pcs. Nuts: 50pcs. So many sizes are enough for daily needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 17, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hardware great, box garbage
reviews.reviewText: The hardware inside was exactly what we needed when we lots the parts that originally came with our Delta Children’s brand crib. However, like all of the other reviews, the plastic box it came in was shattered and all the sizes of parts were mixed together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like how it came with multiple size crib bolts and nuts. It is better to buy the case than to search for just one bolt and pay the same amount. Great buy once again Amazon.

reviews.reviewText: They worked fine exactly what I needed it for but I’m a bit disappointed it came in a very broken case. If I hadn’t been in a time crunch to put this bed together I would’ve returned.
I am repairing a chair and needed these type of fasteners. Instead of buying different sizes I was able to buy this container of different lengths. Very happy with the selection.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: A handy selection and an IKEA lifesaver
reviews.reviewText: I'm the sort of guy that, when I dismantle some flatpack furniture, always leave all the fixings in a little plastic bag and masking tape it to part of the pack. So you can imagine my distress, when I retrieved the parts of an old Billy bookcase from the garage, not to be able to find said fixings. I had promised my son to put it in his room. However, this pack of screws saved me. A great assortment and included just what I needed for the Billy. Jobs are never straightforward, however, and I discovered that most of the dowels were missing too :-( Fortunately, I had previously bought a box of mixed dowels (these ones: https://amzn.to/3Hx3mWy) - hurrah I thought. Problem solved. Except the right diameter dowels were the wrong size. After fiddling about with a junior hacksaw for 10 minutes I decided it was time for the power tools. An experiment with a chop saw went just as well as you might expect - with bits of dowel flying off at great speed. But then I had a revelation, and managed to set up a little jig to help me use my new Bandsaw to chop them down. Which is a long way of saying this was a good buy - and I've plenty more which might encourage me to make something else with some of them.
